aksoy.cipher

Class KeywordCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • aksoy.cipher.MonoAlphabeticCipher
      • aksoy.cipher.KeywordCipher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cipher

    public class KeywordCipher
extends MonoAlphabeticCipher
    Uses the class MonoAlphabeticCipher's basic functionality to encrypt and decrypt text. Changes alphabet based on the secret keyword that is put in.
    Version:
    20-10-2018
    Author:
    Melih Aksoy

    • Method Detail

      • setKeyword

        public void setKeyword(java.lang.String keyword)
                throws CipherException,
                       NoKeywordException
        This method changes the input keyword to fit in to the alphabet. Once all unneeded and duplicate characters are removed, the rest of the alphabet is added to the keyword.
        Parameters:
        keyword - Keyword for use in the alphabet
        Throws:
        CipherException - Thrown when alphabet does not satisfy requirements.
        NoKeywordException - Thrown when no keyword is given.
